mapper.select: SELECT t2.NUTRITION_NAME , t2.NUTRITION_FUNCTION , t2.NUTRITION_INTAKE , t2.NUTRITION_SIDE_EFFECT , t2.NUTRITION_PRECAUTION , t2.NUTRITION_TIMING , t2.NUTRITION_SUMMARY , t1.MENTION FROM NUTRITION_INFO t2 INNER JOIN LEVEL_RECOMMEND_NUTRITION t1 ON t1.NUTRITION_NAME = t2.NUTRITION_NAME WHERE t1.LVL <= #{LEVEL, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT t2.NUTRITION_NAME , t2.NUTRITION_FUNCTION , t2.NUTRITION_INTAKE , t2.NUTRITION_SIDE_EFFECT , t2.NUTRITION_PRECAUTION , t2.NUTRITION_TIMING , t2.NUTRITION_SUMMARY FROM NUTRITION_INFO t2 WHERE NUTRITION_NAME IN (SELECT NUTRITION FROM EXERCISE_PURPOSE_NUTRITION_REL WHERE PURPOSE = #{PURPOSE})
